alert.note: Alert for Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Hampshire; Hardy; Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 09 at 5:18PM EST until January 10 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...West to southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. The strongest winds will be across the ridges above 2,000 feet in the central Shenandoah Valley, and across the ridges and valleys elsewhere. * WHERE...Portions of western Maryland, northwest and western Virginia and eastern West Virginia. * WHEN...From 6 AM to 5 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Grant; Eastern Mineral; Eastern Pendleton; Hampshire; Hardy; Western Mineral
